alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:39PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Meade County through 415 PM MDT... At 339 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Viewfield, or 18 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Viewfield around 355 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Curlew Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.
